name: Destapando Madrid
description:
Game jam theme: Detectives, Madrid

Description:

Short dective game where the player has to investigate a crime across several different sceneries. By investigating clues the player will be able to create customizable interrogations with the npcs in the different levels.

Will you be able to find who did it?

Tease:

Important:

The game is only available in spanish since it was made a for a spanish themed game jam.
